Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development to approve the New York City Housing Authority’s mixed-finance modernization plan to transfer or restructure the ownership of certain developments built by the City and State of New York in order to qualify for federal funding for those developments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
